words.definition: Private and personal information that should be kept safe.
The unique set of characteristics that make a person who they are.
Methods of tricking people into revealing private information like email addresses and passwords.
A person who is responsible for the care and upbringing of a child.
A sudden and unexpected situation that requires immediate attention.
An imagined setting that shows a situation tha can possibly happen.
Able to be trusted or depended on.
A characteristic or ability of something.
